main.name: Duong Dinh
main.description: A hard-working junior web developer having 2 years of experience in developing user. Interface application, with a flair for creating elegant solutions and web interface. Developed an e-commerce web app, hotel resort with room selection web portal, familiar with MERN stack. Passionate about software architecture and a spirit to learn new things. Seeking opportunities and guidance from experienced senior developers.
main.bio: My name is Duong Dinh. I am finishing my degree in Web development from Turku University of Applied Sciences. I am quite focused on making my career in the Web development sector, especially in creating Web pages with feature-rich user experience and a beautiful interface. Besides, although I am an entry level candidate, I have solid knowledge about the core fundamentals of Web technology (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) and React as well as some of the related software. In addition to my studies, I have been engaged in web development a long time ago as an amateur and, due to the interaction with a website called Awwwards contingently, it inspired me to become an autodidact web developer. I have tutored to develop web-based applications such as e(commercial, hotel room selection, and a replicated social network, etc. from design to coding and full implementation under the help of my online tutors.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me via email or phone.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Infomation and Communication Technology
